If you have any concerns or things just don‚Äôt feel right, go and see your doctor. Knowing the symptoms and early detection could save your life.

The symptoms of bowel cancer include:

‚Ä¢ Bleeding from your bottom and / or blood in your poo
‚Ä¢ A persistent and unexplained change in bowel habit
‚Ä¢ Unexplained weight loss
‚Ä¢ Extreme tiredness for no obvious reason
‚Ä¢ A pain or lump in your tummy https://t.co/WyNPnsCRax

If you've any symptoms of #bowelcancer, please contact your GP:

Bleeding from your bottom and/or blood in your poo

A persistent and unexplained change in bowel habit 

Unexplained weight loss

Extreme tiredness for no obvious reason

A pain or lump in your tummy

Please be aware of the symptoms of bowel cancer - 

*Bleeding from your bottom and/or blood in your poo

*A persistent and unexplained change in bowel habit 

* Unexplained weight loss

*Extreme tiredness for no obvious reason

*Lump/pain in your tummy

Bleeding from your bottom or blood in your poo
Unexplained change in bowel habit 
Unexplained weight loss
Extreme tiredness
A pain or lump in your tummy
